nodes.id: 第十一届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十一届全国人民代表大会
中华人民共和国第十一届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关，任期从2008年3月至2013年3月。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China, with a term from March 2008 to March 2013.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间担任全国人大常委会委员长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress during the 11th NPC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间担任全国人大常委会副委员长和会议秘书长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as a Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee and Secretary-General of the sessions of the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国科学家和政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间担任全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: Chinese scientist and politician who served as a Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国蒙古族女性政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间担任全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: A female Chinese politician of Mongolian ethnicity who served as a Vice Chairwoman of the Standing Committee of the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国病理生理学家和政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间担任全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: Chinese pathophysiologist and politician who served as a Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间担任全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as a Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国女性政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间担任全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: A female Chinese politician who served as a Vice Chairwoman of the Standing Committee of the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间担任全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as a Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间担任全国人大常委会副委员长兼秘书长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as a Vice Chairman and concurrently Secretary-General of the Standing Committee of the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国维吾尔族政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间担任全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: A Chinese politician of Uyghur ethnicity who served as a Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国物理学家和政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间担任全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: Chinese physicist and politician who served as a Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间担任全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as a Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国女性政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间担任全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: A female Chinese politician who served as a Vice Chairwoman of the Standing Committee of the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国药理学家和政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间担任全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: Chinese pharmacologist and politician who served as a Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间当选为中华人民共和国主席和中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, elected as President of the People's Republic of China and Chairman of the Central Military Commission during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间当选为中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, elected as Vice President of the People's Republic of China during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, appointed as Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, appointed as a Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国回族政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: A Chinese politician of Hui ethnicity, appointed as a Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, appointed as a Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, appointed as a Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间当选为中华人民共和国最高人民法院院长。
description.en: Chinese politician, elected as President of the Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间当选为中华人民共和国最高人民检察院检察长。
description.en: Chinese politician, elected as Procurator-General of the Supreme People's Procuratorate of the People's Republic of China during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国女性政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为国务委员。
description.en: A female Chinese politician, appointed as a State Councilor during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为国务委员和中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, appointed as a State Councilor and a member of the Central Military Commission during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为国务委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, appointed as a State Councilor during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为国务委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, appointed as a State Councilor during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国土家族政治人物和外交家，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为国务委员。
description.en: A Chinese politician and diplomat of Tujia ethnicity, appointed as a State Councilor during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, appointed as a Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, appointed as a Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, appointed as a member of the Central Military Commission during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, appointed as a member of the Central Military Commission during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, appointed as a member of the Central Military Commission during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, appointed as a member of the Central Military Commission during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, appointed as a member of the Central Military Commission during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军上将，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: An admiral in the People's Liberation Army Navy, appointed as a member of the Central Military Commission during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军上将，在第十一届全国人民代表大会期间被任命为中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army Air Force, appointed as a member of the Central Military Commission during the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任第十一届全国人大常委会委员，后于2010年3月辞职。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as a member of the Standing Committee of the 11th National People's Congress and resigned in March 2010.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任第十一届全国人大常委会委员，后于2011年辞职。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as a member of the Standing Committee of the 11th National People's Congress and resigned in 2011.

nodes.id: 第十一届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 第十一届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
十一届全国人大常委会
en: Standing Committee of the 11th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 第十一届全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the 11th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通称中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府，是最高国家权力机关的执行机关，是最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China, it is the executive body of the highest organ of state power and the highest organ of state administration.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家军事机关，领导全国武装力量。
description.en: The state military authority of the People's Republic of China, leading the nation's armed forces.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院
en: Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高审判机关。
description.en: The highest judicial organ of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国最高人民检察院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民检察院
en: Supreme People's Procuratorate of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高法律监督机关。
description.en: The highest legal supervisory organ of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国刑事诉讼法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国刑事诉讼法

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国关于刑事诉讼程序的法律。第十一届全国人大第五次会议对其进行了修改。
description.en: The law of the People's Republic of China regarding criminal procedure. It was amended during the fifth session of the 11th NPC.

relationships.source: 第十一届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
relationships.target: 第十一届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 第十一届全国人大常委会是第十一届全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The Standing Committee of the 11th NPC is the permanent body of the 11th National People's Congress.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 第十一届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 国务院是最高国家权力机关的执行机关，对全国人民代表大会负责并报告工作。
description.en: The State Council is the executive body of the highest organ of state power and is responsible to and reports to the National People's Congress.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院
relationships.target: 第十一届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 最高人民法院由全国人民代表大会产生，对它负责并报告工作。
description.en: The Supreme People's Court is created by the National People's Congress, to which it is responsible and reports.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国最高人民检察院
relationships.target: 第十一届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 最高人民检察院由全国人民代表大会产生，对它负责并报告工作。
description.en: The Supreme People's Procuratorate is created by the National People's Congress, to which it is responsible and reports.

第十一届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 在2010年3月召开的十一届全国人大三次会议上确认其辞去委员职务。
description.en: His resignation as a member was confirmed at the Third Session of the 11th NPC in March 2010.

relationships.target: 第十一届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 在2011年3月召开的十一届全国人大四次会议上确认其辞去委员职务。
description.en: His resignation as a member was confirmed at the Fourth Session of the 11th NPC in March 2011.

relationships.source: 第十一届全国人民代表大会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国刑事诉讼法

description.zh-cn: 第十一届全国人民代表大会第五次会议表决通过了关于修改《中华人民共和国刑事诉讼法》的决定。
description.en: The Fifth Session of the 11th National People's Congress voted to pass the decision on amending the Criminal Procedure Law of the People's Republic of China.
